Has anyone noticed this yet:

Make a few rooms, put some objects in them.  Next create a new room and then move it into the middle of your old rooms.  

When I do this the objects get all weird (they are all offset by one room and now in differant rooms).

I have not tried to run the game like this (there is no way I'm going to save it like that) so I just delete the new room and never change the order.

Why is this happening (is it just a display issue or are the objects really changing rooms)

I've reproduced this and will add it to the list of bugs to fix for v4.01.
